webscript.description: script to get a single or a list of document types. accept three optional parameters : documentTypeId - to query a document type with the specified document type id documentTypeDescription - to wuery a document type "like" the given description full - if true (the default) only id and description is returned for each document type if no parameter is given, this service will return the complete list of all document types supported return types : xml, json default : xml
